casebody.data:
SYKES, et al.
v.
HEALTH NETWORK SOLUTIONS, INC., et al. 251PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2019 Robert E. Fields, III, Samuel Pinero, II, Leon E. Porter, Winston-Salem, Attorneys at Law, William A. Blancato, GAL Appellate Attorney, for Sykes, Susan, et al.

Ellis B. Drew, III, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem

Jennifer K. Van Zant, Benjamin R. Norman, Greensboro, W. Michael Dowling, Attorney at Law, for Health Network Solutions, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of January 2019 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2019."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
